A bakery wants to test whether increasing the amount of sugar in their cookie recipe will result in a significant increase in sales. They randomly divide their customers into two equal groups and give one group regular cookies and the other group cookies with increased sugar. After one week, they record the number of cookies sold by each group. Based on the data, can you determine whether increasing the amount of sugar in the cookie recipe resulted in a significant increase in sales? Use a significance level of 0.05. 

Group 1 (regular cookies): 150 cookies sold
Group 2 (increased sugar cookies): 190 cookies sold
